name: USoundCue
doc: The behavior of audio playback is defined within Sound Cues.

AttenuationOverrides: Attenuation settings to use if Override Attenuation is set to true
SubtitlePriority: The priority of the subtitle.  Defaults to 10000.  Higher values will play instead of lower values.
bPrimeOnLoad: Makes this sound cue automatically load any sound waves it can play into the cache when it is loaded.
bOverrideAttenuation: Indicates whether attenuation should use the Attenuation Overrides or the Attenuation Settings asset
bExcludeFromRandomNodeBranchCulling: Ignore per-platform random node culling for memory purposes
